DOC.brief_title: Co-infections in Children Hospitalised for Bronchiolitis
DOC.detailed_description: Observational cohort study in children hospitalized for acute bronchiolitis. Patients are nursed in cohort isolation, meaning that all patients admitted for bronchiolitis are cohorted together, irrespective of viral diagnosis. Aim is to investigate the incidence and clinical impact of co-infections in this group.
DOC.criteria: younger than 2 years admitted for bronchiolitis chronic lung disease congenital heart defect down syndrome
